titles.title: Bless That Wonderful Name Of Jesus

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Bless that wonderful name of Jesus. (3x)
No other name I know.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
There's healing in the name of Jesus (Repeat 3X)
No other name I know.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
There's power in the name of Jesus (Repeat 3X)
No other name I know.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
There's love in the name of Jesus (Repeat 3X)
No other name I know.
